text.tspan: Internal Durable Mechanism - SM<>SM in same process
Every time we write to buffer,
If send pointer is initialised back to its last received stream position,
then framing will be correct. All outgoing ACKs will be received
correctly and processed by the other endpoint. As long as the stream
is correctly received, the ACKs coming in from the other endpoint
should correctly acknowledge ALL sent buffer data.
Every time we write to buffer,
If send pointer is initialised back to its last received stream position,
then framing will be correct. All outgoing ACKs will be received
correctly and processed by the other endpoint. As long as the stream
is correctly received, the ACKs coming in from the other endpoint
should correctly acknowledge ALL sent buffer data.
